column1: '''Alcar i Ataren''' is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s unfinished translation of Gloria Patri into [[Quenya]] which he wrote in the 1950s. The manuscript was published in [[Vinyar Tengwar 43|''Vinyar Tengwar''
:Alcar i ataren ar i yondon ar i airefean.
* [[Index:Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien|Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien]]
